snippet: Brad Marchand scored with 47 seconds left in the third period to lift the Boston Bruins to a 3-2 win over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Saturday night....
lead_paragraph: Brad Marchand scored with 47 seconds left in the third period to lift the Boston Bruins to a 3-2 win over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Saturday night.

headline.main: Marchand's Last-Minute Goal Lifts Bruins Past Leafs, 3-2
headline.print_headline: Marchand's Last-Minute Goal Lifts Bruins Past Leafs, 3-2
